title: eFaas
description: Digital identity and single sign-on service for online public portals.

description: Official gazette for government notices, regulations, and legal publications.

description: Ministry portal for budget information, notices, and procurement updates.

description: Tax services, guidance, and payments for individuals and businesses.

description: Traveller declaration portal for arrivals and departures in Maldives.

description: Consular information, diplomatic services, and travel advisories.

description: Ministry updates, circulars, and policy information for education.

title: Health Ministry Portal
description: Health policy updates, guidance, and public health resources.

title: Aasandha Services
description: National health insurance services, claims, and scheme information.

title: Job Center Maldives
description: Job discovery portal connecting employers with job seekers.

title: Business Registration
description: Online company registration and business licensing services.

title: Transport Portal
description: Transport-related notices, forms, and licensing resources.

title: Pension Office Portal
description: Pension account access, statements, and retirement information.

title: MMA Financial Information
description: Monetary and financial regulatory information from MMA.

title: STELCO eBill

title: Fuvahmulah City Council Services
description: City-level services, notices, and permit applications.
